title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Design-Based Curriculum Development for Higher Education 4.0

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design an educational needs analysis process for Industry 4.0 using design pedagogy approaches
Learners can apply design thinking tools to produce prototypes during the technology-integrated curriculum development phases (analysis-design-development-implementation-evaluation)
Learners can develop personalized strategies to continuously improve instructional design plans based on formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
